Class NeedlemanWunsch

java.lang.Object
  gui.BioinfAlgorithm
      cthoelken.NeedlemanWunsch

public class NeedlemanWunsch
extends gui.BioinfAlgorithm

Implementation of the Needleman Wunsch Algorithm for pairwise alignments with linear gap costs.

Author:
Clemens Thoelken

public java.util.Vector<gui.AlgorithmParameter> getInputParameters()
Description copied from class: gui.BioinfAlgorithm
